resources.string: You are at %1$s!. Do you wish to start your trip from here?
Trying to find out in which station you are right now...

Tripnapp is an application that will let you take a nap while riding the subway and wake you up when you reach your destination.Select your destination and that\'s all. Relax, take a nap and Tripnapp will do the rest! This app is part of a Mobile HCI project at University of Glasgow. Project Members are Nikos Theodosis, Panagiotis Papatheodosiou and Michalis Gregoriou
